author: robzajac
content: what are use cases that currently depend on `eth_getProof` and now would leverage the  `ExecutionPayloadHeader`?

author: etan_status
content:
e.g., wallets could verify that the balance being shown has not been tampered with by the web3 API provider.
or, IoT device could verify that remote has a specific NFT on their wallet, for example, access control (they could just send proof)
or, Portal network can provide end-to-end proofs now instead of just execution proofs.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHNrAXf3RDE (some use cases here)
